extensionDescription.message: Search for flights to several cities in several days at once. Fast, safe and the best: for free!

placeholderOrigins.message: Where would you like to leave ?

tooltipOrigins.message: The cities you can leave from. Departuring from a nearby town can be cheaper

placeholderDestinations.message: Where would you like to go ?

tooltipDestinations.message: The cities you intend to know on this trip. Select many and find the cheaper

tooltipRange.message: Choose following days by selecting the first and last one

tooltipReturns.message: The exact days you wanna return

tooltipQtyDays.message: The travel duration. Instead of knowing the exact days to return, you wanna spend some amount of days traveling

placeholderSite.message: Which site you want to search ?

tooltipSite.message: Choose the site you wish to search

tooltipHistory.message: Choose one of your recent searches

placeholderHistory.message: Would you like to repeat a recent search ?

placeholderPriceEmail.message: What is the maximum you want to pay ?

tooltipDonation.message: Make a donation to help improving this app!

tooltipMain.message:
You can select:
One or more origin cities
One or more destination cities
One or more days to leave
Travel duration or days to return
The number of adults, children and infants
Site to search
An email to receive low prices

Suggestions? genghislabs@gmail.com

messagesSendEmailLowFares.message: I'll repeat this search from time to time and I send you an email to EMAIL when I find it for PRICE_EMAIL or less (miles or dollars).

messagesSameOriginAndDestination.message: The origin airport can not be same as destination airport

messagesSelectAtLeastOneDeparture.message: Select at least 1 day to leave
